summary: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.
cast: Robert Carlyle|Rose Byrne|Jeremy Renner|Harold Perrineau|Catherine McCormack|Idris Elba|Imogen Poots|Mackintosh Muggleton|Amanda Walker|Shahid Ahmed|Garfield Morgan|Emily Beecham|Jordan El-Balawi|Meghan Popiel|Stewart Alexander|Philip Bulcock|Chris Ryman|Tristan Tait|William Meredith|Matt Reeves|Thomas Garvey|Tom Bodell|Andrew Byron|Sarah Finigan|Roderic Culver|Maeve Ryan|Ed Coleman|Karen Meagher|Amanda Lawrence|Simon Delaney|Drew Rhys-Williams|Raymond Waring|Kish Sharma|Jane Thorne|Dean Alexandrou|Lasco Atkins|Daniel Baggs|Didier Dell Benjamin|Charlie Bluett|Katie Borland|Gareth Clarke|Jason Curle|Maradona Dias Dos Santos|Laine Edwards|James Fiddy|Tommy Gunn|Pip Henderson|Brian Herring|Zoë Hunter|Daniel Jefferson|Debbie Kurup|Selina Lo|João Costa Menezes|Jane Osborn|Lee Anthony Parnell|Jude Poyer|Joseph Ripley|Jim Templar
keywords: infection|zombie film|zombie outbreak|zombie apocalypse|tied up while barefoot
title: 28 semanas después
